text: Morocco competed in the Summer Olympic Games for the first time at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome, Italy. 47 competitors, all men, took part in 45 events in 10 sports. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font- size:95%" |- ! Medal ! Name ! Sport ! Event ! Date |- | || || Athletics || Men's marathon || |} ==Athletics== Morocco took 8 male athletes to the 1960 Olympic Games. ;Key *Note–Ranks given for track events are within the athlete's heat only *Q = Qualified for the next round *q = Qualified for the next round as a fastest loser or, in field events, by position without achieving the qualifying target *N/A = Round not applicable for the event ===Team Foil=== ====Round One==== Morocco participated in Round One which was a group stage. The six fencers representing Morocco were Charles El-Gressy, Abderraouf El-Fassy, Abderrahman Sebti, Abbes Harchi, Mohamed Ben Joullon, Jacques Ben Gualid. Four fencers were selected for each match. Each fencer had four bouts per match. ====Pool 8==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width=220|Team !width=20| !width=20| !width=30| !width=30| |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 2 || 0 || 25 || 4 |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 1 || 1 || 20 || 9 |- |align=left| || 0 || 2 || 0 || 32 |} :* -- 16-0 :* -- 16-0 ===Individual Épée=== ====Round One==== Three fencers from Morocco participated in Round One which was a group stage. ====Pool 1==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width=220|Team !width=20| |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 4 |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 4 |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 3 |- |align=left| || 3 |- |align=left| || 1 |- |align=left| || 0 |} :* -- 5-3 :* -- 5-3 :* -- 5-3 :* -- 5-1 :* -- 5-0 ====Pool 3==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width=220|Team !width=20| |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 5 |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 4 |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 4 |- |align=left| || 3 |- |align=left| || 3 |- |align=left| || 2 |- |align=left| || 0 |} :* -- 5-4 :* -- 5-3 :* -- 5-0 :* -- 5-1 :* -- 5-2 :* -- 5-3 ====Pool 6==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width=220|Team !width=20| |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 5 |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 4 |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 4 |- |align=left| || 2 |- |align=left| || 2 |- |align=left| || 1 |- |align=left| || 0 |} :* -- 5-1 :* -- 5-2 :* -- 5-2 :* -- 5-4 :* -- 5-0 ===Team Épée=== ====Round One==== Morocco participated in Round One which was a group stage. The five fencers representing Morocco were Abderraouf El-Fassy, Abderrahman Sebti, Abbes Harchi, Mohamed Ben Joullon and Charles Bénitah. Four fencers were selected for each match. Each fencer had four bouts per match. ====Pool 5==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width=220|Team !width=20| !width=20| !width=30| !width=30| |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 2 || 0 || 23 || 8 |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 1 || 1 || 19 || 12 |- |align=left| || 0 || 2 || 5 || 27 |} :* -- 15-1 :* -- 12-4 ===Individual Sabre=== ====Round One==== Three fencers from Morocco participated in Round One which was a group stage. ====Pool 2==== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;" |- !width=220|Team !width=20| !width=20| !width=30| !width=30| |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 4 || 0 || 20 || 6 |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 3 || 1 || 17 || 9 |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 3 || 1 || 16 || 11 |- |align=left| || 1 || 3 || 11 || 16 |- |align=left| || 0 || 3 || 3 || 15 |- |align=left| || 0 || 3 || 3 || 15 |} :* -- 5-1 :* -- 5-1 :* -- 5-1 ====Pool 3==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width=220|Team !width=20| !width=20| !width=30| !width=30| |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 4 || 0 || 20 || 9 |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 3 || 1 || 19 || 13 |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 2 || 2 || 15 || 12 |- |align=left| || 1 || 3 || 9 || 17 |- |align=left| || 0 || 5 || 8 || 20 |} :* -- 5-2 :* -- 5-2 :* -- 5-2 :* -- 5-2 ====Pool 9==== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !width=220|Team !width=20| !width=20| !width=30| !width=30| |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 5 || 0 || 25 || 12 |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 4 || 1 || 22 || 15 |-bgcolor="#ccffcc" |align=left| || 3 || 2 || 23 || 16 |- |align=left| || 2 || 3 || 18 || 18 |- |align=left| || 1 || 4 || 13 || 22 |- |align=left| || 0 || 5 || 7 || 25 |} :* -- 5-1 :* -- 5-3 :* -- 5-1 :* -- 5-0 :* -- 5-2 ===Team Sabre=== ====Round One==== Morocco participated in Round One which was a group stage. Each gymnast to perform a compulsory and an optional exercise on all six apparatuses. Top five scores per team on each of the 12 exercises count towards the team score. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan=2|Apparatus |- style="font-size:95%" !Compulsory !Optional !Total !Rank |-align=center |align=left|Floor |36.25 |37.70 |73.95 |20 |-align=center |align=left|Vault |35.10 |36.05 |71.15 |20 |-align=center |align=left|Parallel bars |21.00 |32.50 |53.50 |20 |-align=center |align=left|Horizontal bar |18.50 |26.25 |44.75 |20 |-align=center |align=left|Rings |23.60 |26.40 |50.00 |20 |-align=center |align=left|Pommel horse |19.15 |25.50 |44.65 |20 |-align=center |align=left|Total |153.60 |184.40 |338.00 |20 |} ==Modern pentathlon== Two male pentathletes represented Morocco in 1960, but neither completed the event. ;Individual {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !colspan=3|Riding (show jumping) !colspan=3|Fencing (épée one touch) !colspan=3|Shooting (10 m air pistol) !colspan=3|Swimming (300 m freestyle) !colspan=3|Running (4000 m) !rowspan=2|Total points !rowspan=2|Final rank |-style="font-size:95%" !Penalties !Rank !MP points !Wins !Rank !MP points !Score !Rank !MP points !Time !Rank !MP Points !Time !Rank !MP Points |-align=center |align=left|Mohamed Ben Checkroun |80 |52 |671 |colspan=14|Did not finish |-align=center |align=left|Naji El-Mekki |colspan=17|Did not finish |} ==Sailing== Only one Moroccan sailor competed in the Olympic Regatta in Naples. ==Wrestling== Scoring by negative points, with negative points given for any result short of a fall. Accumulation of 6 negative points eliminated the wrestler. Morocco had 5 wrestlers all competing in the Greco-Roman category. ;Men's Greco-Roman Wrestling {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !Round 1 !Round 2 !Round 3 !Round 4 !Round 5 !Round 6 !Round 7 !Final Round |-style="font-size:95%" !Opposition Result !Opposition Result !Opposition Result !Opposition Result !Opposition Result !Opposition Result !Opposition Result !Opposition Result |-align=center |align=left|Michel Ben Akoun |align=left|Bantamweight | L 4-0 VT | L 4-0 VT |colspan=12|Did not advance |-align=center |align=left|Rahal Mahassine |align=left|Featherweight | | L 3-1 DE | L 4-0 VT |colspan=10|Did not advance |-align=center |align=left|Mohamed Moukrim Ben Mansour |align=left|Lightweight | L 4-0 VT | L 3-1 DE |colspan=12|Did not advance |-align=center |align=left|Sam Azoulay |align=left|Welterweight | L 3-1 DE | | L 4-0 VT |colspan=10|Did not advance |-align=center |align=left|Hammou Haddaoui Khadir |align=left|Middleweight | D 2-2 DR | L 4-0 VT |colspan=12|Did not advance |-align=center |} ==References== ==External links== *Official Olympic Reports *International Olympic Committee results database Category:Nations at the 1960 Summer Olympics 1960 Category:1960 in Moroccan sport
